content: or facebook stories and give me credit as the author of the design thank you for supporting my work i m going to love seeing your finished design copyright 2019 by ternura amigurumi all rights reserved for personal use only the pattern or parts thereof may not be published reproduced shared altered translated into other languages or resold for commercial purposes you may only sell the finished product made by you in a small quantity it is forbidden to use the photos in this guide to advertise or sell your finished product if you publish photos of crocheted toys following this pattern it is always welcome to mention ternura_amigurumi as the author of the pattern
